title: Southwest General
description: The medical staff at Southwest General deals in secrets, romance, betrayal, soliloquies, and more.
quote: If you want to win me over you’ll have to deal with my mind and not my lips.
altHero: a young female nurse and an older female administrator
alt1: the administrator giving a stern talk to a male doctor
alt2: the administrator speaking with a patient
alt3: the young nurse speaks passionately with her arms gripping the male doctor’s arms
